comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~o-tony

comments.content:
It was introduced by this change:

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/197176/

And actually the error shows up in the gate queue on patch set 2 of that change but for some reason Jenkins didn't fail so it was merged and now we have it intermittently failing.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
This is probably a better query since it's not filtering on the gate queue:

http://logstash.openstack.org/#
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem
